echoing_strikes.name: Echoing Strikes
echoing_strikes.description: On crit, 50% chance to ricochet (if projectile) or damage twice (if not). Reduces base damage by 20%.

all_rounder.name: All Rounder
all_rounder.description: A balanced approach to survival. +8% damage, +10% max health, +6% move speed, and +5% crit chance.

merchant_affinity.name: Merchant's Affinity
merchant_affinity.description: Gain the ability to refresh reward choices. Gain 1 refresh per level. Refreshes stack if unused.

blood_pact.name: Blood Pact
blood_pact.description: Heal for 5% of enemy max HP on kill. If at full health, gain 1% of enemy max HP as permanent max HP instead.
